name: Supergirl Season 2
summary: 续订第2季！电视台由CBS更换至CW。
info:
• 中文名: 女超人 第二季
  • 别名: 超女 第二季
  • 别名: 超级少女 第二季
  • 集数: 22
  • 开始: 2016-10-10
  • 类型: 动作 / 科幻 / 冒险
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视台: CW
  • 首播国家: 美国
  • imdb_id: tt5716756

eps.name: The Adventures of Supergirl
eps.desc: Supergirl and Clark team up to stop a new threat emerging in National City; Alex feels left out while Kara's family stays in town; a pod comes crashing down to earth.

eps.name: The Last Children of Krypton
eps.desc: Supergirl is hurt by a kryptonite-powered villain sent by Cadmus to attack National City. Superman blames Hank since the kryptonite was stolen from the DEO. In the meantime, Kara's first day at her new job doesn't go as planned when she meets her new boss.

eps.name: Welcome to Earth
eps.desc: Supergirl and the DEO are assigned to protect the President when an attack on her causes alien vs. human rights in National City to heat up. Alex investigates the case with Maggie Sawyer while Kara fears Mon-El may be responsible.

eps.name: Survivors
eps.desc: Supergirl tries to stop an alien fight club run by Roulette, while Hank gets to know M'Gann.

eps.name: Crossfire
eps.desc: Supergirl faces a ruthless new gang that's been given new alien technology by Cadmus.

eps.name: Changing
eps.desc: The Guardian arrives to lend a hand when an alien parasite drains Supergirl of her power. Mon-El contemplates his motives when he considers a new career. Alex faces a new reality.

eps.name: The Darkest Place
eps.desc: Supergirl comes face-to-face with Cyborg Superman when she attempts to save Mon-El from Cadmus.

eps.name: Medusa
eps.desc: As Eliza comes to National City for Thanksgiving, Kara turns to Lena for help when Cadmus unleashes a virus that instantly kills aliens, then is asked by Barry Allen and Cisco Ramon for help with an alien invasion on their Earth.

eps.name: Supergirl Lives
eps.desc: While searching for a missing woman, Supergirl and Mon-El end up on another planet where Roulette leads a slave trafficking ring.

eps.name: We Can Be Heroes
eps.desc: When Livewire apparently breaks out of prison, Supergirl sets out to recapture her.

eps.name: The Martian Chronicles
eps.desc: A White Martian called Armek comes to National City with the intention of bringing M'gann back to Mars to be punished for her treason.

eps.name: Luthors
eps.desc: Lena is arrested when Metallo breaks Lillian out of prison and evidence suggests that Lena is responsible.

eps.name: Mr. & Mrs. Mxyzptlk
eps.desc: A magical imp called Mr. Mxyzptlk arrives on Earth and wreaks havoc on National City when Kara doesn't reciprocate his feelings.

eps.name: Homecoming
eps.desc: When Jeremiah Danvers is rescued from Cadmus, Alex and Kara are thrilled to have him back, but Mon-El is suspicious about his sudden return.

eps.name: Exodus
eps.desc: Alex and Kara realize they must break the rules to foil Cadmus' latest plot.
